title.rendered: Ek Ladki Ko Dekha Toh Aisa Laga

content.rendered:
Directed by Shelly Chopra Dhar.

Written by Gazal Dhaliwal. Shelly Chopra Dhar. Gazal Dhaliwal. Gazal Dhaliwal. P.G. Wodehouse. Muhammad Asif Ali. Muhammad Asif Ali.

Cast Sonam Kapoor(Sweety Chaudhary (as Sonam K. Ahuja)). Anil Kapoor(Balbir Chaudhary). Rajkummar Rao(Sahil Mirza). Juhi Chawla(Chatro). Abhishek Duhan(Babloo Chaudhary). Regina Cassandra(Kuhu). Madhumalti Kapoor(Beeji). Seema Pahwa(Billauri). Brijendra Kala(Chaubey). Alka Badola Kaushal(Sahil’s Mother). Kanwaljeet Singh(Sahil’s Father (as Kanwaljit Singh)). Akshay Oberoi(Raza). Sandeep Kapoor(Joginder). Teddy Maurya(Play Director (as Teddy Lalji Maurya)). K.K. Shukla(Journalist (as KK Shukla)). Manoj Bakshi(Police Inspector). Sara Arjun(12 Year Old Sweety). Yash Arora(14 Year Old Babloo). Dilnoor Chauhan(8 Year Old Sweety (as Dilnoor)). Hiten(10 Year Old Babloo). Rohun Chopra Dhar(Play Actor – Delhi). Sanya Bansal(Play Actress – Delhi). Inderpal Singh(Sweety’s Mama). Manju Sharma(Sweety’s Mami). K.N. Sekhon(Mama (In the Play) (as K. N. Sekhon)). Subhash K. Dhar(Chef). Kulbir(Nosy Lady). Jasneet Kaur(Sweety’s Friend). Spencer Patwal(Sici) .Yogesh Bhardwaj. Md Shohag Hossain(Nandan).Chandramogli Madem. K K Shukla(Trivedi). Shamsher Singh(Junior artist). Abdul Quadir Amin(Varun (uncredited)). Daljit Arora((uncredited)). Aron Mitr(Passenger in Metro (uncredited))

Language Hindi.

Producers Vidhu Vinod Chopra. Lawrence D’Souza. Yogesh Ishwar. Hetvi Karia. Raeshem Nijhon. Navmeet Singh. Alok Sinha.

Production Fox STAR Studios. Rajkumar Hirani Films. Vinod Chopra Productions.
